summary: Allows to edit DokuWiki pages via XMLRPC
name: DokuVimKi
description:
This plugin allows you to edit wiki pages of a remote DokuWiki [1] instance using the DokuWiki XMLRPC API. 

For more information please visit  http://www.chimeric.de/projects/dokuwiki/dokuvimki

[1] http://dokuwiki.org
install_details: Unpack into your ~/.vim folder. You'll need vim with python support enabled, a recent development snapshot of DokuWiki and the dokuwikixmlrpc python module (install using easy_install).
